verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> or <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, to the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H4257>Mahalath<s%> <S%H6031>Leannoth<s%>, <S%H4905>Maschil<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman<s%> the <S%H250>Ezrahite<s%>. O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, I have <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> before thee: for the sons: or, of the sons Maschil: or, A Psalm of Heman the Ezrahite, giving instruction
Let my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: <S%H5186>incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> unto my <S%H7440>cry<s%>;
For my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7646>full<s%> of <S%H7451>troubles<s%>: and my <S%H2416>life<s%> draweth <S%H5060>nigh<s%> unto the <S%H7585>grave<s%>.
I am <S%H2803>counted<s%> with them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit<s%>: I am as a <S%H1397>man<s%> that hath no <S%H353>strength<s%>:

<S%H2670>Free<s%> among the <S%H4191>dead<s%>, like the <S%H2491>slain<s%> that <S%H7901>lie<s%> in the <S%H6913>grave<s%>, whom thou <S%H2142>rememberest<s%> no more: and they are cut <S%H1504>off<s%> from thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>. from: or, by
Thou hast <S%H7896>laid<s%> me in the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H953>pit<s%>, in <S%H4285>darkness<s%>, in the <S%H4688>deeps<s%>.
Thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> lieth <S%H5564>hard<s%> upon me, and thou hast <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> me with all thy <S%H4867>waves<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

Thou hast put <S%H7368>away<s%> mine <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from me; thou hast <S%H7896>made<s%> me an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto them: I am shut <S%H3607>up<s%>, and I cannot come <S%H3318>forth<s%>.

Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H1669>mourneth<s%> by reason of <S%H6040>affliction<s%>: <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I have <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> upon thee, I have stretched <S%H7849>out<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> unto thee.
Wilt thou <S%H6213>shew<s%> <S%H6382>wonders<s%> to the <S%H4191>dead<s%>? shall the <S%H7496>dead<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee? <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
Shall thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> be <S%H5608>declared<s%> in the <S%H6913>grave<s%>? or thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> in <S%H11>destruction<s%>?
Shall thy <S%H6382>wonders<s%> be <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark<s%>? and thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5388>forgetfulness<s%>?
But unto thee have I <S%H7768>cried<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> shall my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H6923>prevent<s%> thee.
<S%H3068>LORD<s%>, why castest thou <S%H2186>off<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? why <S%H5641>hidest<s%> thou thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from me?
I am <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and ready to <S%H1478>die<s%> from my <S%H5290>youth<s%> up: while I <S%H5375>suffer<s%> thy <S%H367>terrors<s%> I am <S%H6323>distracted<s%>.
Thy fierce <S%H2740>wrath<s%> goeth <S%H5674>over<s%> me; thy <S%H1161>terrors<s%> have cut me <S%H6789>off<s%>.
They came round <S%H5437>about<s%> me <S%H3117>daily<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%>; they <S%H5362>compassed<s%> me about <S%H3162>together<s%>. daily: or, all the day
<S%H157>Lover<s%> and <S%H7453>friend<s%> hast thou put <S%H7368>far<s%> from me, and mine <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%> into <S%H4285>darkness<s%>.
